summary: This document is an email chain from February 2019 between an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York and an Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) attorney. The AUSA is reaching out to coordinate regarding the ongoing investigation of Jeffrey Epstein, seeking to discuss deconfliction between their respective matters.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the subject of the current investigation being conducted by the Southern District of New York.

events.title: SDNY Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York contacts the Office of Professional Responsibility to discuss deconfliction regarding the ongoing investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the SDNY was actively investigating Jeffrey Epstein as of February 2019.
The prosecutor reached out to the Department of Justice's Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) for coordination and deconfliction.
The communication indicates inter-agency coordination was occurring regarding the Epstein investigation.
The email chain shows the investigation was ongoing and active in early 2019.
